name: intrg-orpon.yml
configuration:
spring:
  application:
    name: nttm-intgr-orpon
  data:
    solr:
      user: "solr"
      pass: "SolrRocks"
      host: "http://art-platform.io:8081/solr"
  jmx:
    enabled: false
management:
  endpoints:
    web:
      path-mapping:
        prometheus: metrics
      base-path: /
      exposure:
        include: prometheus
  health.solr.enabled: false
logging:
  config: classpath:log4j2-dev.yaml
  level:
    org.hibernate: error
    org.hibernate.SQL: error
    org.zalando.logbook: info
logbook:
  format:
    style: http
  exclude:
    - "**/metrics"
server:
  port: 8112
  servlet:
    context-path: /nttm-intgr-orpon
orpon:
  url: "http://art-platform.io:8083/PONWebServices/WsSearchAddrElByFullNamePortType"
app:
  jwt:
    expire: ${JWT_EXPIRE:90000000} #90000000ms = 25hrs
    secret: ${JWT_SECRET_KEY:z%C*F-JaNdRgUkXn2r5u8x/A?D(G+KbPeShVmYq3s6v9y&E)H@McQfTjWnZr4h}
    server: http://10.28.97.89:8080/nttm-auth-jwt/api/
